sentences.en: A few of the jeeps had run out of ammunition.
sentences.cn: 几辆吉普车上的弹药已经用光了.
争论是他的攻击[防御]手段.

sentences.en: He had only seven rounds of ammunition for the revolver.
sentences.cn: 他只有7发左轮手枪的弹药。

sentences.en: Most of the ships were woefully short of ammunition.
sentences.cn: 大多数舰船弹药极度匮乏。

sentences.en: Stocks of ammunition were running low.
The enemy had expended all their ammunition.
sentences.cn: 敌人已耗尽所有的弹药.

sentences.en: The letter gave her all the ammunition she needed.
sentences.cn: 这封信给了她所需的一切有力证据。

sentences.en: The soldiers ran out of ammunition and had to withdraw.
sentences.cn: 士兵们用光了弹药,不得不撤退.
大货车载着备用的弹药。

sentences.en: They blazed away all their ammunition.
sentences.cn: 他们把所有弹药都打光了.

sentences.en: They confiscated weapons, ammunition and propaganda material.
sentences.cn: 他们没收了武器、弹药和宣传材料。

sentences.en: They have expended all their ammunition.
They trained in the jungle using live ammunition.
sentences.cn: 他们在丛林中接受真枪实弹的训练。

sentences.en: They went on firing until all their ammunition was spent.
sentences.cn: 他们不断射击,直到耗尽所有的弹药.

sentences.en: Under cross-examination, he admitted the state troopers used more destructive ammunition than usual.
sentences.cn: 在反复盘问下，他承认该州警察使用了比平常更具破坏性的弹药。

sentences.en: We have shot away all our ammunition.

trans.tran_cn: 弹药，（辩论中可攻击对方的）事实
trans.tran_en: bullets, shells (  shell  ) etc that are fired from guns
